oscar?

Tolga, You got to be kidding me. Do you know how to comprehend a sentence? Cause that's how he raps. With substance & reason. Whether it's crazy talk or a real deep meaning he makes absolute sense...

Oliver - I like tech, and a lot of songs are better than Rap God. The impressive thing about RG is he is coherent at talking about the same thing (Him being great) through the whole song at an great speed. But tech on his best day doesn't beat Eminem. Never has & never will. And I heavily fux with Tech. He is a great one and if the industry wasn't punks people would recognize it. But he still ain't better that Em.

Whoever is fuckin dumb enough to think that ANYONE compares to Eminem, is SADLY mistaken. He's the greatest music artist, not just rapper, in history. Dead or alive, no one will EVER EVER EVER even come close to em.
If you think that Eminems lyrics dont make sense is time for you start listening to house music or somethin rap aint for ya.
